attributes.action: Get schools to teach disability and diversity in schools nationwide!
attributes.additional_details: Being disabled myself and gone though bullying at school it’s time to say no and do something about it!
attributes.background: Get schools to teach disability and diversity in schools nationwide! So less kids get bullied about being disabled and to be able to ask others about there disabled and not have a stigma!

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Add education on diversity and racism to all school curriculums: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/323808

To introduce common disabilities to the curriculum for primary and secondary: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/551829

Disability awareness at all levels of national curriculum to prevent bullying: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/551591
